name: Mirror Beauty
description:
Summary

Match 3 × beautiful girl × easy to develop!

System


Classic match-3 battle gameplay! !
After completing the level, you can improve your ability!
Defeating enemies will unlock beautiful CGs in the gallery!

Introduction


In order to save important people, you urgently need to get the Spirit of Holy Water. In order to get it, you urgently need to find Altina. But Altina is not someone who can see it. What is waiting for you in front of you? !

Karina/Karina

Guarding the Spirit of Elixir and Altina's Sexy Guard
